New Features in Customize

Customize allows you to implement new features in CareSuite 7.2. Use Customize to do the following:

l Set the type of access to the charts of patients admitted to bedside workstations.

l Configure advanced workstation settings (previously, this was done in VC Customize).

l Add trends to flowsheets.

l Create flowsheet sections that combine data from all care categories: medications, fluids, nursing care, scores, laboratory tasks and respiratory care.

l Designate frequently-used protocols for quick selection.

l Set the default starting time for protocols and custom orders.

l Oblige Preop Manager users to enter all required data before performing the final sign-off for an evaluation.

l Create a preoperative risk assessment form with custom criteria, findings with points, point ranges and recommendations.

l Create custom statuses for preoperative records.
